Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton Abu Dhabi in Abu Dhabi (Abu Dhabi Corniche), you'll be convenient to Abu Dhabi International Marine Sports Club and Marina Mall. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Heritage Village and Open Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 327 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Digital programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and outdoor tennis courts. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 15 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a beach bar or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 15 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a beach bar or a swim-up bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Abu Dhabi International Marine Sports Club - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Marina Mall - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Heritage Village - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Open Beach - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Khalidiyah Mall - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Qasr al-Hosn - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Al-Hosn Palace - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Cultural Foundation - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Al Hosn University - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Shaikh Khalifa Medical City - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Zayed City Market - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Al Wahda Mall - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
The Corniche - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Capital Garden - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Al Wahda Club - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 32.6 km / 20.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Abu Dhabi is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hilton Abu Dhabi are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 32.6 km / 20.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Abu Dhabi is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show & early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date,name & room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding,no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Compulsory Tourism Dirham Fee of 15AED to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night. Be advised that beachfront promenade area,the Corniche is being developed & improved.Construction may be visible or audible from the hotel.From May-August end, construction work will be carried out adjacent to the hotel from 9am to 5pm every day.This project is being conducted by the owning company of the hotel and will include the construction of new F&B outlets.The side of the construction is covered by a wall mask to minimize disturbance to our guests.The company understands that rooms may be partially obstructed and audible by the construction.Please rest assured that the hotel is fully operational and all facilities are available without limitations.
